pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a street lined with traditional Japanese buildings, where a group of students in school uniforms are gathered outside a shop. As the camera moves forward, two women dressed in traditional kimonos are seen standing and talking in front of the shop. The shop has various signs and advertisements displayed outside, including images of food items. The background features a mountainous landscape under a partly cloudy sky. The camera continues to move forward, focusing on the two women in kimonos and the students outside the shop.
